entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Puvirnituq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:07 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow, -25.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Puvirnituq Airport 12:46 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Condition: Snow
Temperature: -25.7°C
Pressure: 99.8 kPa
Visibility: 0.6 km
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -42
Dewpoint: -28.8°C
Wind: S 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow this morning. Local blowing snow this afternoon. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 51 this morning and minus 43 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 35. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 45 this evening and minus 52 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 35. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 35. Wind chill near minus 52. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
